ApproxsimClient.proj
Class PolarStereographicProjection

java.lang.Object
  ApproxsimClient.proj.PolarStereographicProjection

public class PolarStereographicProjection
extends Object

This is implementation of the Polar Stereographic projection where (longitude/latitude) values are converted into (easting/northing) values and vice versa.

static double[] convertGeodeticToPolarStereographic(double longitude, double latitude)
          This method converts geodetic coordinates (latitude and longitude) to Polar Stereographic coordinates (easting and northing), according to the current ellipsoid and Polar Stereographic projection parameters.
static double[] convertPolarStereographicToGeodetic(double easting, double northing)
          This method converts Polar Stereographic coordinates (easting and northing) to geodetic coordinates (latitude and longitude) according to the current ellipsoid and Polar Stereographic projection Parameters.

Method Detail

setPolarStereographicParameters

public static boolean setPolarStereographicParameters(double latitude_of_true_scale,
                                                      double longitude_down_from_pole,
                                                      double false_easting,
                                                      double false_northing)
This method receives the ellipsoid parameters and Polar Stereograpic projection parameters as inputs, and sets the corresponding state variables.

Parameters:
latitude_of_true_scale - latitude of true scale, in radians.
longitude_down_from_pole - longitude down from pole, in radians.
false_easting - easting (X) at center of projection, in meters.
false_northing - northing (Y) at center of projection, in meters.
Returns:
true if no error occured, false otherwise.

getOriginLatitude

public static double getOriginLatitude()
Returns the latitude in radians at the origin of the projection.

getOriginLongitude

public static double getOriginLongitude()
Returns the longitude in radians at the center of the projection.

getFalseEasting

public static double getFalseEasting()
Returns the false easting in meters.

getFalseNorthing

public static double getFalseNorthing()
Returns the false northing in meters.

POLAR_POW

public static double POLAR_POW(double essin)
Help function.

convertGeodeticToPolarStereographic

public static double[] convertGeodeticToPolarStereographic(double longitude,
                                                           double latitude)
This method converts geodetic coordinates (latitude and longitude) to Polar Stereographic coordinates (easting and northing), according to the current ellipsoid and Polar Stereographic projection parameters.

Parameters:
latitude - latitude, in radians.
longitude - longitude, in radians.
Returns:
[Easting (X), Northing (Y)] in meters.

convertPolarStereographicToGeodetic

public static double[] convertPolarStereographicToGeodetic(double easting,
                                                           double northing)
This method converts Polar Stereographic coordinates (easting and northing) to geodetic coordinates (latitude and longitude) according to the current ellipsoid and Polar Stereographic projection Parameters.

Parameters:
easting - easting (X), in meters.
northing - northing (Y), in meters.
Returns:
[longitude, latitude] in radians.
